data.questText: I did a bit of scouting on my own and noticed some kind of larger idol or totem the Leo seemed to be clustered around. What I want you to do is get close to one (or three) and see if it provides any clues for tracking this hero of theirs down.
data.completeText: This is... more information than I thought you would get. I bet it was a bloody business too. Wish I could have been there, but I'm too old for that kind of work now.
